head.title: Cheatsheet styles
head.intro:
This is a reference of styles that you can use on Devhints cheatsheets. How
meta!
You can refer to this when contributing your own cheatsheets to the [GitHub repo](https://github.com/rstacruz/cheatsheets/).

body.title: H2 sections
body.elms:
| `-one-column` | | | `-two-column` | _(default)_| | `-three-column` | | | `-left-reference` | 3 columns
_(short first column)_ | | `-no-hide` | Don't hide H2 | See: [H2 sections](#two-columns)

body.title: H3 sections
body.elms:
| `-prime` | Highlight |

See: [H3 sections](#h3-sections-1)

body.title: Tables
body.elms:
| `-bold-first` | Bold first column |
| `-headers` | Show headers |
| `-left-align` | Don't right align last column |
| `-mute-em` | Lower opacity for italics |
| `-no-wrap` | Don't wrap text |
| `-shortcuts` | Shortcut keys |

See: [Tables](#tables-1)

body.title: Code
body.elms:
| `-box-chars` | Less line height
_for box drawing chars_ | | `-setup` | Gray background | | `-wrap` | Enables line-wrapping | See: [Code](#code-1)

body.title: Paragraphs
body.elms:
| `-setup` | Gray background |
| `-crosslink` | Has arrow on the link |
{: .-gray}

See: [Paragraphs](#paragraphs-1)

body.title: Lists
body.elms:
| `-also-see` | Lighter background |
| `-four-column` | |
| `-six-column` | |

See: [Lists](#lists-1)

body.title: Supported
body.elms:
Each section can have the following children:

#### White

- `pre`
- `ul`
- `table`

#### Gray

- `p`
- `h4`

body.title: Prime section
body.elms:
{: .-prime}

This is a section with `{: .-prime}`. Notice the fancy highlight! Great for "getting started" kind of snippets.

body.title: H3 section
body.elms:
Every box is an H3 section. The box will encompass everything inside the body of the H3.

This is a basic section with paragraphs in it.

Code
----
{: .-three-column}

body.title: Basic code
body.elms:
```js
here.is(() => {
  some.code()
})
```

```js
here.is.some.more()
```

Code blocks can be placed one after the other.

See: [Cheatsheets](/)

body.title: Code with headings
Highlighted lines
Multiple highlights
Setup blocks
Long lines
Line wrapping
body.elms:
```js
<script>(function(d,s){if(window.Promise&&[].includes&&Object.assign&&window.Map)return;var js,sc=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];js=d.createElement(s);js.src='https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js';sc.parentNode.insertBefore(js, sc);}(document,'script'))</script>
```
{: .-wrap}

Add `-wrap` to wrap long lines.
{: .-three-column}

body.title: Lists
body.elms:
- This is
- a list
- with a few items

Here's an extra paragraph after the list.

body.title: Lists with headings
body.elms:
#### Part 1

- `createElement()`
- `componentDidMount()`
- `componentWillUnmount()`

#### Part 2

- `shouldComponentUpdate()`
- `componentWillReceiveProps()`


Here's an extra paragraph after the list.
{: .-one-column}

body.elms:

Add `{: .-six-column}` to make large lists.

body.elms:
- One
- Two
- Three
- Four
- Five

- Seven
- Eight
- Nine
- Ten
- Eleven
{: .-four-column}

Add `{: .-four-column}` to make large lists.

body.title: Also see
body.elms:
- One
- Two
- Three
- Four
- Five
- Six
- Seven
- Eight
- Nine

{: .-also-see}

Add `{: .-also-see}`.
{: .-three-column}

body.title: Basic paragraphs
body.elms: This is a basic section with paragraphs in it. When paragraphs are the first elements in an H3 section's body, they appear as white.

body.title: Basic paragraphs
body.elms:
```
···
```

When paragraphs appear after `pre`/`table`/`ul`, they appear with a gray background.

body.title: Preludes
body.elms:
Here's a prelude paragraph. Add `{: .-setup}` to make paragraphs appear with a gray background.
{: .-setup}

```
···
```

body.title: Crosslink
body.elms:
Add `{: .-crosslink}` to make big loud external links:

```
···
```

[Home](/)
{: .-crosslink}
{: .-three-column}

body.title: Basic table
body.elms:
#### Date

| Example         | Output                 |
| ---             | ---                    |
| `%m/%d/%Y`      | `06/05/2013`           |
| `%A, %B %e, %Y` | `Sunday, June 5, 2013` |
| `%b %e %a`      | `Jun 5 Sun`            |

#### Time

| Example         | Output                 |
| ---             | ---                    |
| `%H:%M`         | `23:05`                |
| `%I:%M %p`      | `11:05 PM`             |

This is a basic table with h4's.

body.title: Shortcuts
body.elms:
| `V` | Vector |
| `P` | Pencil |
| `T` | Text |
| `L` | Line |
| `R` | Rectangle |
| `O` | Oval |
| `U` | Rounded |
{: .-shortcuts}

Add `{: .-shortcuts}` to tables.

body.title: With headers
body.elms:
| Prefix | Example               | What     |
| ---    | ---                   | ---      |
| `//`   | `//hr[@class='edge']` | Anywhere |
| `./`   | `./a`                 | Relative |
| `/`    | `/html/body/div`      | Root     |
{: .-headers}

Add `{: .-headers}` to add headers.
{: .-left-reference}
{: .-one-column}
